definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: In place of Isaac, God provided a ram for Abraham to sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 神为亚伯拉罕预备了献祭的公羊，代替以撒。

sentences.english: The one-time ejaculate volume of Poll Dorset ram, sperm density and sperm motility rate increased by 0.
sentences.chinese: 与对照组相比，可提高无角陶赛特公羊一次射精量0。

sentences.english: Year of the Sheep? I'm betting it all on the St. Louis Rams this season.
sentences.chinese: 羊年？那我这一赛季全赌圣路易斯公羊队上了。

sentences.english: Then abraham looked up, and he saw a ram .
sentences.chinese: 亚伯拉罕昂起头，看见一只公羊。

sentences.english: Another piece depicted a ram with his head turned back.
sentences.chinese: 还有一块是一只回头的公羊。

sentences.english: Male sheep have their own name. A male sheep is a -- what? A ram.
sentences.chinese: 公羊也有自己的名字，公羊叫什么？

sentences.english: I will offer unto thee burnt sacrifices of fatlings, with the incense of rams; I will offer bullocks with goats.
sentences.chinese: 我要把肥牛作燔祭，将公羊的香祭献给你。

sentences.english: South Suffolk rams may be used on any breed of ewe and will even produce prime lambs from Merino ewes.
sentences.chinese: 南萨福克公羊也许能与任一种母羊生产出头等羊羔。

sentences.english: A bull, a cock and a he goat are males.
sentences.chinese: 公牛，公鸡，公羊都是雄性动物。

sentences.english: And it shall be a lamb without blemish, a male, of one year: according to which rite also you shall take a kid.
sentences.chinese: 羔羊应是一岁无残疾的公羊，要由绵羊或山羊中挑选。

sentences.english: Here are nice little ram sayings you can add to your gift.
sentences.chinese: 这里有可爱的小公羊的说法，您可以添加到您的礼物。
